name: Diary of an NPC
description:
I am a humble Shopkeeper narrating everyday life in town while keeping tabs on the journey of our Brave Heroine.

  • Quick playthrough of some choice RPG tropes. Like, super-quick.
  • Read only, no choices.

My first game made with Twine! I really enjoyed learning how to make this, and welcome feedback to help me improve on future games/stories I may create.

Broom picture used under a public domain license.
